channel.title: Kyle Seeback
channel.description: Recent news about Kyle Seeback, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Lunch at PAMA hosted by Chair, Emil Kolb with local councilors, MPP and fellow MP colleagues. #Brampton http://t.co/EgqEc0bCfV

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Canada’s economic growth has been revised upward & Canada is now projected to lead the G7 in economic growth for 2013.http://t.co/GwAOepP463

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Poverty and income inequality down, lowest federal taxes in generation. OECD "Canada to lead economic growth in G7 in 2013". Our CPC record.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: “@acoyne: Jeffrey Goldberg: Obama Is About to Undermine His Mideast Doctrine http://t.co/MYyAYYqs5N”A very interesting read.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "@Huskers: Coach Osborne in front of new Bob Devaney Statue. #GBR #Huskers. http://t.co/EjZ99ViRrW"Love it. Husker proud up here in Canada.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
